text.section: All debts, claims, obligations, and liabilities of the Corporation, whenever incurred, shall be the debts, claims, obligations, and liabilities of the Corporation only and not of the State, other units of State government, other State instrumentalities, State officers, or State employees.
The debts, claims, obligations, and liabilities of the Corporation may not be considered a debt, claim, obligation, or liability of the State or a pledge of its full faith and credit.
